item.title: Extract the Main Topics from Books
item.description: body { text-align: justify} LDA is used to classify text in a document to a particular topic. It builds a topic per document model and words per topic model, modeled as Dirichlet distributions. For an introductin to Topic Model and LDA please check out this link.
